content: Hello! Thank you for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today? Are you needing help with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC?
Um hi. I think I need help with my sink, the water won't drain right.
Thank you for letting me know! I can help schedule a plumber to take a look at your sink. May I have your name, please?
My name’s Linda. Will this cost a lot? I’m not sure how it works.

Thank you, Linda! Costs can vary depending on the problem. I can provide a price estimate after asking a few more questions. Could you please share your address so I can check if you’re in our service area?
Oh it’s uh... 645 South Lark Road. Wait hang on a sec—someone’s at my door.
No problem, Linda! Let me know when you’re ready to continue and I’ll help you with the next steps.
